body_html: @hashamMunir It seems that you may not set your correct Windows environment path, leading to cannot find the dll. As discussed above, just use Cuda 9.0, cudnn 7, and make sure setting the "PATH" variable correctly in your system. Then it should work.
body_text: @hashamMunir It seems that you may not set your correct Windows environment path, leading to cannot find the dll. As discussed above, just use Cuda 9.0, cudnn 7, and make sure setting the "PATH" variable correctly in your system. Then it should work.
body: @hashamMunir It seems that you may not set your correct Windows environment path, leading to cannot find the dll. As discussed above, just use Cuda 9.0, cudnn 7, and make sure setting the "PATH" variable correctly in your system. Then it should work.
